resources.string:
* For any sick child who can drink, advise to give fluids and continue feeding

* Advise to keep the child warm if the child is NOT hot with fever
* If the child is hot with fever advise to dress lightly to allow fever to cool

* For referrals, send SMS or call Nurse at Thandanani; write referral note; help caregiver and child to get to clinic

* Always advise on when to go to the health facility:
      if child cannot drink or eat
      if child becomes more sick
      if child has blood in the stool
* Show caregiver how to prepare ORS and give immediately
* Advise to take zinc supplement: 1 dose daily for 10 days; age 2 months to less than 6 months, half tablet for 10 days (5 tablets); age 6 months to 5 years, 1 tablet for 10 days (10 tablets)
* Explain that the child might need antibiotics
